Header: China Media Group releases 8K documentary about Shanghai
Content: The China Media Group released an 8-K documentary about Shanghai called “The City of Yulan” just ahead of the Second China International Import Expo which will kick off in the eastern city of China today. Yulan, or Magnolia denudata, is the city flower and symbol of Shanghai. The film adopts Yulan to vividly illustrate the distinctive character of the city, that is, openness, innovation and inclusiveness. A stunning light show was also staged to celebrate the release of the documentary.
